title: Articles should open from any new content preview
custom_steps: Articles should open from any new content preview using the same regression suite as any article in the mixed feed

title: Videos should open from any new content preview
custom_steps: Videos should open from any new content preview using the same regression suite as the mixed feed

title: VSM content should open from any new content preview
custom_steps: VSM content should open from any new content preview using the same regression suite as the mixed feed.  This should include the special case scenarios such as opening game stories in native chrome.

title: Short content should open from any new content preview
custom_steps: Short content should open from any new content preview using the same regression suite as the mixed feed.

title: All stories should follow the same regression suite as the mixed feed
custom_steps: All stories should follow the same regression suite as the mixed feed.  Changes to the URL mapping as being specified for groups should follow the same pattern present for home where grouped stories are opened (this functionality is not in today but should be picked up by the newer modules).

title: All video autoplay settings for new modules should follow the same regression suite as the mixed feed
custom_steps: All video autoplay settings for new modules should follow the same regression suite as the mixed feed.  In addition the mixed feed should start respecting the autoplay feature available on the individual article and video.

title: Conviva and adobe analytics should be consistent with home for autoplay videos
custom_steps: Conviva and adobe analytics should be consistent with home for autoplay videos with the exception of where the video is played from.

title: All analytics for opening an article,video, vsm content should remain consistent
custom_steps: All analytics for opening an article,video, vsm content should remain consistent with what we are using today including the "News" in the path as defined in contentful analytics field.

title: surfaceCollection call fails w/ analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the MLB App
custom_steps:
WHEN News is loaded
AND the surfaceCollection api call fails
custom_expected:
THEN the default surface collection loads
AND surface.slug will be set to "news-fallback" in calls to Adobe analytics for the News

title: Section title
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the module is configured with a section title field
WHEN the business updates the title in the configured section
THEN the updated title should be displayed in the module
AND the update should not require a release"

title: Displaying Timestamps - Invalid, content has no timestamp flag
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is content with timestamps flag on
THEN the timestamps should be visible"

title: Configurable Field for Timestamp to Author Transition on Articles
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is an article with a timestamp flag on
WHEN 24 hours pass since the article was published
THEN the content should transition to display the author name instead of the timestamp"

title: Timestamps Always Displayed for Video Content
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is video content with timestamps flag on
THEN the timestamps should always be visible
AND the timestamps should not transition to display author names when 24 hours pass since publish"

title: Displaying Only Timestamp when Timestamp is Disabled - Invalid, content has no timestamp flag
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is content with timestamps flag off
THEN only the timestamp should be visible
AND the timestamps should not transition to display author names when 24 hours pass since publish"

title: Accept Featured Article
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the module is configured to display Featured article
THEN the featured article should have a larger visual treatment"

title: Supporting a Minimum of 4 Content Pieces
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there are at least 4 articles available for display
THEN the module should display exactly 4 content pieces
AND the module should not break if there are exactly 4 articles
AND the module should not break if there are more than 4 articles"

title: Displaying First Video in the Article as the Featured Item
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is an article with embedded videos
AND the featured flag is set to true for the article
AND the autoplay flag is set to true for the article
THEN the first embedded video in the article should be displayed as the featured item"

title: Opening an article by tapping within the bounding box
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the news tab
WHEN the user taps within the bounding box of an article (e.g., the thumbnail, the headline, the timestamp area)
THEN the article webview should be opened"

title: Opening a video by tapping on a video thumbnail attached to an article
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the news tab
AND there is an article with a video attached
WHEN the user taps on the video thumbnail
THEN the video player should be launched"

title: Opening an article by tapping on the headline of a featured item showing a video
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the news tab
AND there is an article with a video attached as the featured item When the user taps within the bounding box of the article (excluding the video area)
THEN the article webview should be opened."

title: Accepting Only Videos and Articles as Content Options - Invalid VSM and Short are valid options
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the module is configured to display content
AND there are various content options available, including articles, videos, and tap stories
THEN only videos and articles should be selectable as content options
AND tapping on a cell should not unexpectedly launch a tap story"

title: Displaying Timestamps and contributors when "ReplaceTimeStampWithAuthorDuration" is set
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contributor tag is set on an article
custom_steps:
WHEN "ReplaceTimeStampWithAuthorDuration" is set to a positive integer
AND the article  is viewed in the module
custom_expected:
THEN the timestamps should be visible 
AND then it should transition to displaying the contributor after the set number of hours has elapsed after the timestamp

title: Configurable Field for Timestamp to Author Transition on Articles
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is an article with a timestamp flag on
WHEN 24 hours pass since the article was published
THEN the content should transition to display the author name instead of the timestamp"

title: Timestamps Always Displayed for Video Content
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is video content with timestamps flag on
THEN the timestamps should always be visible
AND the timestamps should not transition to display author names when 24 hours pass since publish"

title: Displaying Only Timestamp when "ReplaceTimeStampWithAuthorDuration" not set
custom_preconds: GIVEN and article in a editorial carousel or feed
custom_steps:
WHEN "ReplaceTimeStampWithAuthorDuration" not set in Contentful
AND the article is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN only the timestamp should be visible
AND the timestamps should not transition to display author names

title: Accept Featured Article - Feed only?
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the module is configured to display Featured article
THEN the featured article should have a larger visual treatment"

title: Setting Minimum Number of Items to 3 - deprecated?
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the minimum number of items is set to 3
AND there are at least 3 articles available for display
THEN the module should display a minimum of 3 content pieces
AND the module should not break if there are exactly 3 articles
AND the module should not break if there are more than 3 articles
AND the module should scroll as intended"

custom_steps:

custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the news tab

THEN the article webview should be opened."

title: Accepting Only Videos and Articles as Content Options - deprecated
custom_preconds: GIVEN the module is configured to display content
custom_steps: WHEN ContentTypes are selected in the contentful module settings
custom_expected: THEN only the selected content types will display

title: Small, Medium, Large Style setting
custom_preconds: GIVEN an Editorial Carousel module is configured on a surface

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it will display with the smallest thumbnail size

THEN it will display with the medium thumbnail size on iPad
AND it will display with the smallest thumbnail size in iPhone
THEN it will display with the largest thumbnail size

At least 4 articles or videos are in the selection list

title: Opening a video by tapping on a video thumbnail attached to an article
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the news tab
AND there is an article with a video attached
WHEN the user taps on the video thumbnail
THEN the video player should be launched"

title: Opening an article by tapping on the headline of a featured item showing a video
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the news tab
AND there is an article with a video attached as the featured item When the user taps within the bounding box of the article (excluding the video area)
THEN the article webview should be opened."

title: Accepting Only Videos and Articles as Content Options
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the module is configured to display content
AND there are various content options available, including articles, videos, and tap stories
THEN only videos and articles should be selectable as content options
AND tapping on a cell should not unexpectedly launch a tap story"

title: Section title
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the module is configured with a section title field
WHEN the business updates the title in the configured section
THEN the updated title should be displayed in the module
AND the update should not require a release"

title: Displaying Timestamps
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is content with timestamps flag on
THEN the timestamps should be visible"

title: Configurable Field for Timestamp to Author Transition on Articles
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is an article with a timestamp flag on
WHEN 24 hours pass since the article was published
THEN the content should transition to display the author name instead of the timestamp"

title: Timestamps Always Displayed for Video Content
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is video content with timestamps flag on
THEN the timestamps should always be visible
AND the timestamps should not transition to display author names when 24 hours pass since publish"

title: Displaying Only Timestamp when Timestamp is Disabled
custom_steps:
"GIVEN there is content with timestamps flag off
THEN only the timestamp should be visible
AND the timestamps should not transition to display author names when 24 hours pass since publish"

title: Opening an article by tapping within the bounding box
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the news tab
WHEN the user taps within the bounding box of an article (e.g., the thumbnail, the headline, the timestamp area)
THEN the article webview should be opened"

THEN the video player should be launched"

THEN the article should be opened"

THEN the articles should be displayed"

THEN the module should not break if more or fewer articles are attempted to be added"

title: See all expand
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user is on the headline stack module
AND has more than 6 articles
THEN only a subset of articles should be displayed
WHEN the user taps the ""See All"" button in the articles module
THEN the articles list should be expanded to display all available articles"

title: See all collapse
custom_steps:
"GIVEN the user has expanded the articles list
WHEN the user taps the ""See All"" button again
THEN the articles list should be collapsed, showing only a subset of articles"

title: Bilingual - Topic Collection Screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the News tab
custom_steps: WHEN they navigate to the topics selection page (gear icon)
custom_expected: THEN they will see a new language preference option where they toggle between both English and Spanish

title: Bilingual - Language Switch Behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has changed their language choice within the Topic Collection menu
custom_steps: WHEN they tap Continue to News Feed
custom_expected: THEN the News tab will load the respective EN or ES version of the Contentful data model that powers the News tab (the pills could be different between both languages - this is not a direct translation of whats on the screen)

title: Bilingual -  Persisting Pill Preferences Between Languages
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has changed their language choice within the Topic Collection menu
AND topic preferences are selected for both languages
custom_steps: WHEN they load the topic collection page or the News feed
custom_expected:
THEN both screens will reflect their preferred topics selections
AND the topic selections will persist for both languages until the app is restarted, after which only the selections for the currently selected language will persist

title: Bilingual - Persisting Pill Preferences Between Cycles
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has changed their language choice within the Topic Collection menu
custom_steps: WHEN they jump between tabs, soft close the app (background it) or hard close the app
custom_expected: THEN their last language selection will be persisted and restored when they go back to the News tab

title: Bilingual - Feature Flag
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the News tab topic selection page
custom_steps:
WHEN the feature flag is set to false
Android: Firebase firebase news_enable_language_preference 
iOS: Account Settings > Feature Flags > Flags Browser > ReleaseFlags > surfaceBuilder > supportCustomReadingLanguage
custom_expected: THEN the language preferences section will not show in the topic selection screen

title: Bilingual - Tapping Content
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the News tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device is set to Spanish
AND the language selected in news settings is either English or Spanish
AND content is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content will open in the language selected in news settings

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device is set to English
AND the language selected in news settings is either Spanish or English
AND content is tapped
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content will open in the language selected in news settings

title: Bilingual - Default selected language
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an MLB App user
AND "Continue to News Feed" / "Continua hacia el feed de News"  has not been tapped since a fresh install

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device language is changed to Spanish
AND the News topic selection screen is viewed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Languages and Preferences (Preferencias de Lenguaje) section will show Spanish (Espanol) selected
AND the selectable topics and News content will be in Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the MLB App is freshly installed after the device language is set to Spanish
AND the News topic selection screen is viewed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Languages and Preferences (Preferencias de Lenguaje) section will show Spanish (Espanol) selected
AND the selectable topics and News content will be in Spanish

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the device language is changed to English 
AND the News topic selection screen is viewed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Languages and Preferences section will show English selected
AND the selectable topics and News content will be in English

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the MLB App is freshly installed after the device language is set to English
AND the News topic selection screen is viewed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Languages and Preferences section will show English selected
AND the selectable topics and News content will be in English

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN "Continue to News Feed" / "Continua hacia el feed de News" is tapped
AND the app is not subsequently reinstalled
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the selected language will persist regardless of changes to the device language 
AND the topics and News content will be in the selected language

title: Module Display Configuration
custom_preconds: Given display modules set in Contentful
custom_steps: When fav team news pill is loaded
custom_expected: Then render modules set in Contentful

title: Surface Collection: Midfield: Pinned surfaces
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Surface Collection configured in Contentful with both regular' and Pinned surfaces
custom_steps: WHEN the query for Pinned surfaces is made
custom_expected: THEN the Pinned surfaces are returned

title: Pinned Surfaces Display First
custom_preconds: GIVEN surfaces are added as Pinned Surfaces for a Contentful surface collection
custom_steps: WHEN the News page is viewed
custom_expected:
THEN the pinned surfaces will display first in the pill list
AND they will be sorted in the order shown in Contentful

title: Build UI of screen (empty state)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is accessing the new News experience for the first time
custom_steps: WHEN they have continued passed the Feature Onboarding Tutorial
custom_expected:
THEN they will see this screen giving them the option to select what pills they interest them the most
AND a close button giving them an option to dismiss the menu

title: Build UI of screen (selected state)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is accessing the new News experience for the first time
custom_steps: WHEN they have continued passed the Feature Onboarding Tutorial
custom_expected:
THEN they will see this screen giving them the option to select up to (4) topics that interest them most
AND when they select their topics they will be added above the line as part of their selected lists

title: Sort pills based on selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has made their selections
custom_steps: WHEN they load the news feed
custom_expected: THEN the pills will be sorted in the order shown in settings

title: Tapping filter button launches this screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the news index
custom_steps: WHEN they tap the edit / filter button
custom_expected: THEN this screen will launch allowing them to edit their selections

title: Deselect Logic
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Topic Collection page with entries already added
custom_steps: WHEN they tap a topic that is selected / activated and is above the line
custom_expected: THEN this will get added back to the end of the list of pills below the line

title: Pinned Surfaces Do not display in preferred topic list
custom_preconds: GIVEN a surface is added as a Pinned Surface for a Contentful surface collection
custom_steps: WHEN the preferred topics list is viewed in the MLBAPP News page settings
custom_expected: THEN the pinned surface will not be in the list

title: Featured Article or video with Autoplay Enabled - Invalid, article thumbnail autoplay is no longer supported
custom_steps:
GIVEN that an article is tagged as featured and autoplay is enabled
WHEN it loads in the module
THEN the video in the playback URL thats embedded in the article will be the thumbnail item that autoplays on the index
AND tapping that autoplaying thumbnail will load the article

title: Video Content Type in Selection List
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a video is part of the selection list feeding the module
WHEN displayed on the client
THEN the item will have the appropriate video decorations: play button and video duration stamp

title: Tapping an Article or Video
custom_steps:
GIVEN that the module has loaded
WHEN a user taps on an article
THEN the article will launch
AND when a user taps on a video
THEN the video player will launch

title: 6-12 Tap Stories in List
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Tap Story Stack Module is configured in Contentful
custom_steps: WHEN 6 - 12 tap stories are in the selection list
custom_expected:
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 3x2 4x2, 5x2 and 6x2 (mobile), 2x3, 3x3, 4x3 (ipad) row x column configurations

Replicate this test for 6, 9, 12

title: Truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module
custom_preconds: GIVEN the Tap Story Stack Module is configured in Contentful
custom_steps: WHEN 6 - 12 tap stories are in the selection list
custom_expected:
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 3x2 4x2, 5x2 and 6x2 (mobile), 2x3, 3x3, 4x3 (ipad) row x column configurations
AND truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module

Replicate this test for 7,8,10,11,13
e.g. 7 tap stories received = use 3 rows by 2 column grid Tap Story Stack Module

title: More than 12 or Less than 6 Tap Stories in List
custom_preconds: GIVEN  the Tap Story Stack Module is configured in Contentful
custom_steps: WHEN more than 12 ore less than 6 tap stories are in the selection list
custom_expected: THEN do not display the module at all

title: 1 Tap Story in List
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 1 article is in the selection list
AND the Single Tap Story Module is configured in Contentful
THEN display that article in the appropriate Single Tap Story UI

title: 2 Tap Stories in List
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 2 tap stories are in the selection list
AND the Duo Tap Story Module is configured in Contentful
THEN display that article in the appropriate Duo Tap Story UI
AND place 1 story link in per story cell

title: 3 Tap Stories in List
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 3 tap stories are in the selection list
AND the Trio Tap Story Module is configured in Contentful
THEN display that article in the appropriate Trio Tap Story UI
AND place 1 story link in per story cell

title: More than 3 tap stories
8 to 20 articles or videos are in the selection list | NO FEATURED ITEM
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 8 - 20 articles or videos are in the selection list
AND the Quartet Module is configured in Contentful
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 2x4, 3x4 ,4x4, or 5x4 row x column configurations

title: Truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module | NO FEATURED ITEM
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 8 -20 articles or videos are in the selection list
AND the Quartet Module is configured in Contentful
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 2x4, 3x4 ,4x4, or 5x4 row x column configurations
AND truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module

Replicate this test for numbers that are not multiple of 4.
e.g 14 articles received = use 3 rows by 4 column grid Quartet (Truncate article list down to 12 articles to fill Quartet x3)

title: 5 articles or videos are in the selection list | FEATURED ITEM
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 5 articles or videos are in the selection list and there is a featured item
AND the Quartet Module is configured in Contentful
THEN pull the featured item out of the list and place it as a featured article on top of the grid with appropriate visual treatment
AND create the grid in the appropriate 1x4 column configurations

title: Truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module | FEATURED ITEM
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 5 articles or videos are in the selection list and there is a featured item
AND the Quartet Module is configured in Contentful
THEN pull the featured item out of the list and place it as a featured article on top of the grid with appropriate visual treatment
AND create the grid in the appropriate 1x4 column configurations
AND truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module

e.g 6 articles received = use 1 rows by 4 column grid Quartet (Truncate article list down to 4 articles to fill Quartet)

title: 8 to 20 articles or videos are in the selection list | FEATURED ITEM & BREAKING NEWS
custom_steps:
GIVEN the feature flag is enabled and the breaking news flag is enabled 
AND the Quartet Module is configured in Contentful
THEN pull the featured item out of the list and place it as a featured article on top of the grid with appropriate visual treatment
AND display the breaking news badge replacing contentPreview.large with contentPreview.hero

title: Less than 8 articles or videos are in the selection list
custom_steps:
GIVEN that less than 8 articles are in the selection list
AND the Quartet Module is configured in Contentful
THEN do not display the module at all

title: 9 to 15 articles or videos are in the selection list | NO FEATURED ARTICLE
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 9 - 15 articles or videos are in the selection list
AND the Trio Module is configured in Contentful
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 3x3, 4x3, 5x3, row x column configurations 

Replicate this test for 9, 12, 15

title: Truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module | NO FEATURED ARTICLE
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 9 - 15 articles or videos are in the selection list
AND the Trio Module is configured in Contentful
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 3x3, 4x3, 5x3, row x column configurations 
AND truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module

Replicate this test for 10, 11, 13, 14, 16
e.g. 11 articles received = use 3 rows by 3 column grid Trio (Truncate article list down to 9 articles to fill Trio x3)

title: 4 articles or videos  are in the selection list | FEATURED ARTICLE
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 4 articles  or videos are in the selection list and there is a featured item
AND the Trio Module is configured in Contentful
THEN pull the featured item out of the list and place it as a featured article on top of the grid with appropriate visual treatment
AND create the grid in the appropriate 1x3 column configurations

title: Truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module | FEATURED ARTICLE
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 4 articles  or videos are in the selection list and there is a featured item
AND the Trio Module is configured in Contentful
THEN pull the featured item out of the list and place it as a featured article on top of the grid with appropriate visual treatment
AND create the grid in the appropriate 1x3 column configurations
AND truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module

e.g. 14 articles received = use 4 rows by 3 column grid Trio (Truncate article list down to 3 articles to fill Trio)

title: 8 to 20 articles or videos are in the selection list | FEATURED ITEM & BREAKING NEWS
custom_steps:
GIVEN the feature flag is enabled and the breaking news flag is enabled 
AND the Trio Module is configured in Contentful
THEN pull the featured item out of the list and place it as a featured article on top of the grid with appropriate visual treatmen
AND display the breaking news badge replacing contentPreview.large with contentPreview.hero

title: Less than 4 articles or videos are in the selection list
custom_steps:
GIVEN that less than 4 articles or videos are in the selection list
AND the Trio Module is configured in Contentful
THEN do not display the module at all

title: Less than 6 articles or videos  are in the selection list
custom_steps:
GIVEN that less than 6 articles are in the selection list
AND the Duo Module is configured in Contentful
THEN do not display the module at all

title: 6 to 12 articles or videos are in the selection list
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 6 -12 articles are in the selection list
AND the Duo Module is configured in Contentful
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 3x2, 4x2, 5x2, or 6x2 row x column configurations

Replicate this test case for 6, 8, 10 & 12

title: Truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module
custom_steps:
GIVEN that 6 -12 articles are in the selection list
AND the Duo Module is configured in Contentful
THEN create the grid in the appropriate 3x2, 4x2, 5x2, or 6x2 row x column configurations
AND truncate the list to the lower multiple of the module

Replicate this test for 7, 9 & 11

e.g. 7 articles received = use 3 rows by 2 column grid (Truncate article list down to 6 articles to fill Duo x3)
e.g. 11 articles received = use 5 rows by 2 column grid (Truncate article list down to 10 articles to fill Duo x5)

title: More than 13 articles or videos are in the selection list
custom_steps: TBD
